DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy tailor telephone intervention promote inform decision make prostate cancer test among predominantly immigrant black men .
DOC.brief_title: Prostate Cancer Education African American Men
DOC.detailed_description: African American African-Caribbean men great prostate cancer incidence mortality rate . Professional organization provide conflict recommendation regard prostate cancer test generally agree men learn risk benefit test share decision test base personal preference . This study design assess effect decision support intervention men 's knowledge prostate cancer testing , participation medical decision test , decision conflict relate testing , congruence prostate cancer test intention behavior . A randomized control trial conduct . Participants randomize one two condition : ( ) tailor telephone education prostate cancer test ( intervention group ) ( b ) tailor telephone education national guideline fruit vegetable consumption ( attention control group ) .
DOC.criteria: 45 70 year old African descent accessible telephone primary care physician Prostate cancer test 12 month prior enrollment History prostate cancer
